mapper.select: SELECT A.pic pic, A.nm name, A.gender , A.birthdate, A.phone , A.student_num, B.major_name majorName , A.created_at createdAt, A.email, C.score scoreStudent, rating FROM student A INNER JOIN major B ON A.imajor = B.imajor INNER JOIN student_semester_score C ON A.istudent = C.istudent WHERE A.istudent = #{istudent} AND A.student_num = #{studentNum} AND A.nm = #{name}
